Class ec.ui.FieldView 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----ec.ui.InspectorProportionalTextFieldView
                   |
                   +----ec.ui.FieldView
class FieldView
extends InspectorProportionalTextFieldView
implements Target
View class for displaying a single Field. Displays name and type as labels and provides editable text field for displaying and setting the value. Under the variable name and the value field/button, the declared type of the variable is (optionally) displayed. This string is the value of the ivar typeText.

This class is not public and can therefore cannot be used outside this package.
